channel.title: Posts - T햇햇
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on T햇햇

item.title: PhD Proof of work
item.description: Phd activities over the study period

item.title: Performance analysis and modelling of grid-connected small photovoltaic system
item.description: The small PV power station, located in Southeast Bulgaria is analysed. Performance analysis of a 30 kW solar photovoltaic power plant is done

item.title: Interactive education web-based platform for theoretical electrical engineering related topics
item.description: Web-based educational platform, which delivers resources and theoretical electrical engineering related topics

item.title: Typography
item.description: Typography and styles of the posts, this is the description of the topic

item.title: Numerical modeling of the magnetic field distribution in single-phase single-core transformer
item.description: An electromagnetic model of single-phase single-core transformer is made and a numerical simulation of the electromagnetic field is performed.

item.title: Modelling and analysis of hybrid power station
item.description: Simulation model of hybrid power station containing Photovoltaic and wind generator sources as well as energy storage.

item.title: Simulation of three-phase invertor for quasi-sinusoidal voltage
item.description: An inverter that synthesizes three-phase quasi-sinusoidal voltage supply to the active load through method of controlled pulses with pulse-width modulation is investigated.

item.title: Simulation of sinusoidal voltage inverter using reducing switching losses PWM strategy
item.description: The article examines the work of a converter that synthesizes sinusoidal voltage supply to the active-inductive load through method of controlled high-frequency pulses with sinusoidal pulse-width modulation.
